title: Le Menu
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Organic, Salad bar, Russian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Part of the Troitskiy Most group of restaurants; this branch name change to Le Menu. Serves salads, hot dishes, drinks and desserts. There is an English version of the menu with a vegetarian section.
